code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{collection,onSnapshot,doc}from'firebase/firestore';import{firestore,auth}from'../firebase';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Slider(_ref){let{selectUserToChat,selectedUserId}=_ref;const[acceptedUsers,setAcceptedUsers]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const currentUser=auth.currentUser;if(!currentUser)return;const unsubscribe=onSnapshot(collection(firestore,`users/${currentUser.uid}/invites`),snapshot=>{const users=snapshot.docs.filter(doc=>doc.data().status==='accepted').map(doc=>({id:doc.id,...doc.data()}));setAcceptedUsers(users);});return()=>unsubscribe();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"overflow-y-auto",children:acceptedUsers.map(user=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`flex items-center p-2 cursor-pointer ${selectedUserId===user.id?'bg-gray-600':'hover:bg-gray-500'}`,onClick:()=>selectUserToChat(user),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-white",children:user.fromName})},user.id))});}export default Slider;
